name: Black and White - no color in sight - UGJ submission
name_original: Black and White - no color in sight - UGJ submission
description:
you play as a character who's world has been stripped of all its colors and is only left with black and white. you go on a short quest to retrieve all 3 primary colors and unlock upgrades along the way.

audio:

https://freesound.org/people/reinsamba/sounds/18765/

lighting system for GMS2:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/7820/lighting-system-2d

download the low graphics build if you don't have high end PC, it is really difficult to run due to the custom lighting system.
